title: Measuring Taste - Film
description:
Now we turn to film—your taste, knowledge, and instincts.

You'll see movies, directors, and performances from across eras and genres. Some questions are easy, others trickier. There are no wrong answers—just what you enjoy, notice, or value.

Ready to explore your cinematic self?
